title: Catalogue, "Announcement for the Ex Libris Exhibition "Futurist Photography," New York", 1990
medium: Lithography in orange, black and grey ink on off-white shiny wove paper
inscribed:
Inscribed on cover across the top in black ink: FUTURIST [Diagonally] PHOTOGRAPHY
Inside cover across the bottom: FUTURIST PHOTOGRAPHY MAY 12 TO JUNE 30 1990
On back cover at bottom: EX LIBRIS 160A EAST 70 STREET NEW YORK 10021 TELEPHONE 212 249 2618 FAX 212 249 1465
creditline: Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff
description: The front and back covers have black and orange geometric designs. On the cover inside are images of photographs from the exhibition.

tombstone.epitaph:
Catalogue, "Announcement for the Ex Libris Exhibition "Futurist Photography," New York", 1990.
1990. Lithography in orange, black and grey ink on off-white shiny wove paper. Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff. 1993-31-147.
